name: Gilbert vs Goblins
description:
Welcome to Gilbert VS Goblins. You play as Gilbert, an experienced treasure hunter who decides to makes his lair of goods in a crystal cave, only he doesn't realize there are unexpected visitors...

-Unique enemies lie about, which become more challenging as the waves progress.

-Move towers at will, wherever you want, whenever you want.

-Control Gilbert in an engaging tower defense with a Blunderbuss as your last resort.
